task.summary: Default task
Added the code that sends a message repeatidly WITHOUT sleep and ran a thread that reads a line and print it !
Added Arduino code
Serial code added (python)
changed baudrate to 9600
Added main.py
Reformatted nodes.py top stop generating indentation errors.
Fixed an error in Arduino.send
Fixed an error in Arduino.send

Modification to main.py and nodes.py
- Removed message length in message composition in Arduino.send() - Added a serial read thread in main.py:main() - Corrected the connection mechanism with Arduino - Tested unplugging Arduino USB cable while executing but serial.isOpen() still returned True !

Fixed the distortion problem in serial communication.
- Flushes is the reason. - Flushes are not necessary at all and you've to turn around it if you needed to clear the serial buffer somehow. - Commented all flushes in this code and Arduino code and everything works just fine. - Simultaneous send/receive via serial port worked perfectly with almost no delay at all (need to be tested). - NOTICE: port names are in COMs for windows not for linux. Need to be changed to raspberry pi.

Modified Arduino.send()
- Removed map(values, str) because it is unnecessary. - returned the number of characters written to serial port inside Arduino.send()
Modified host ip to 127.0.0.2.
Changed baudrate to 115200.

Arduino code for serial communication without losses .
- Baudrate 115200 - Receives a message and echoes it back - NO FLUSHes - No distortion and losses.

Added 2 arduino files.
- Added Arduino Nano code. - Added brushless motor code.

Added 2 arduino files.
- Added Arduino Nano code. - Added brushless motor code.
Modified main2().
Modifications in the RPi2
Modified connection flag and placement of sensor println.
Modified connection flag and placement of sensor println.
Modified connection flag and placement of sensor println.
Modified connection flag and placement of sensor println.
Added sensors
Added sensors
Added servo.py and start.py - Modified servo.py - removed import pydev
Returned the code to the state of no brushless motors
Added left and right Arduino. - Added structs instead of arrays - used the old arrangement or motors - used the new serial algorithm
Modified and added Right and Left Arduino. - Modified Left_Arduino and added IMU code.
Made the code more modular and flexible.
Made Arduino inherits from serial.Serial
Modified main2.py and servo.py to cope with changes in nodes.py
Added control.py - handles arduinos and ethernet messages.
Modified nodes.py to be compatible with control.py

MESSAGE.value: Serial code added (python)
changed baudrate to 9600
Added main.py
Reformatted nodes.py top stop generating indentation errors.
Fixed an error in Arduino.send

Modification to main.py and nodes.py
- Removed message length in message composition in Arduino.send() - Added a serial read thread in main.py:main() - Corrected the connection mechanism with Arduino - Tested unplugging Arduino USB cable while executing but serial.isOpen() still returned True !

Fixed the distortion problem in serial communication.
- Flushes is the reason. - Flushes are not necessary at all and you've to turn around it if you needed to clear the serial buffer somehow. - Commented all flushes in this code and Arduino code and everything works just fine. - Simultaneous send/receive via serial port worked perfectly with almost no delay at all (need to be tested). - NOTICE: port names are in COMs for windows not for linux. Need to be changed to raspberry pi.

Modified Arduino.send()
- Removed map(values, str) because it is unnecessary. - returned the number of characters written to serial port inside Arduino.send()
Modified host ip to 127.0.0.2.
Changed baudrate to 115200.

Arduino code for serial communication without losses .
- Baudrate 115200 - Receives a message and echoes it back - NO FLUSHes - No distortion and losses.

Added 2 arduino files.
- Added Arduino Nano code. - Added brushless motor code.
Modified main2().
Modifications in the RPi2
Modified connection flag and placement of sensor println.
Added sensors
Added servo.py and start.py - Modified servo.py - removed import pydev
Returned the code to the state of no brushless motors
Added left and right Arduino. - Added structs instead of arrays - used the old arrangement or motors - used the new serial algorithm
Modified and added Right and Left Arduino. - Modified Left_Arduino and added IMU code.
Made the code more modular and flexible.
Made Arduino inherits from serial.Serial
Modified main2.py and servo.py to cope with changes in nodes.py
